 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַף‎</span> **verb** ==be wroth== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il ***make wrathful*** (rare); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be wrathful***, also ***be anxious, fearful***);-**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.41.10|Gen 41:10]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְצֹף‎</span> [[Lev.10.6|Lev 10:6]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצֹף‎</span> [[Isa.54.9|Isa 54:9]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹצֵף‎</span> [[Zech.1.15|Zech 1:15]]-***be wroth:*** 

**1.** of God; absolute [[Deut.1.34|Deut 1:34]]; [[Isa.57.16|Isa 57:16]]; [[Isa.57.17|Isa 57:17]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.64.4|Isa 64:4]]; [[Isa.64.8|Isa 64:8]]; [[Zech.1.15|Zech 1:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***, [[Lev.10.6|Lev 10:6]]; [[Num.16.22|Num 16:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.9.19|Deut 9:19]]; [[Isa.47.6|Isa 47:6]]; [[Isa.54.9|Isa 54:9]]; [[Lam.5.22|Lam 5:22]]; [[Zech.1.2|Zech 1:2]]; [[Zech.1.15|Zech 1:15]]; [[Eccl.5.5|Eccl 5:5]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Josh.22.18|Josh 22:18]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** of man; absolute [[Esth.1.12|Esth 1:12]]; [[Esth.2.21|Esth 2:21]]; [[2Kgs.5.11|2Kgs 5:11]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Gen.40.2|Gen 40:2]]; [[Gen.41.10|Gen 41:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.16.20|Exod 16:20]]; [[Lev.10.16|Lev 10:16]]; [[Num.31.14|Num 31:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Jer.37.15|Jer 37:15]]; [[1Sam.29.4|1Sam 29:4]]; [[2Kgs.13.19|2Kgs 13:19]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְצַפְתָּ‎</span> [[Deut.9.7|Deut 9:7]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְצַפְתֶּם‎</span> v[[Deut.9.8|Deut 9:8]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַקְצִיפוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.32|Ps 106:32]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקְצִיף‎</span> [[Zech.8.14|Zech 8:14]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְצִפִים‎</span> [[Deut.9.22|Deut 9:22]]-***provoke to wrath***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Deut.9.7|Deut 9:7]]; [[Deut.9.8|Deut 9:8]]; [[Deut.9.22|Deut 9:22]]; [[Zech.8.14|Zech 8:14]] so (accusative omitted) [[Ps.106.32|Ps 106:32]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***put oneself in a rage: Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְקַצַּף‎</span> [[Isa.8.21|Isa 8:21]], of hard-pressed people.
